    bash-completion \
    bison \
    flex \
    libssl-dev \
    openssl \
    libxml2-dev \
    libxslt1-dev \
    libcurl4-openssl-dev \
    libcurl4 \
    libsystemd-dev \
    libvncserver-dev \
    libcurl4-openssl-dev \
    libxml2-dev \
    libxslt1-dev \
    libssl-dev \
    libaugeas-dev \
    libzmq5 \
    libzmq3-dev \
    libtool \
    autoconf \
    libcairo2-dev \
    libossp-uuid-dev \
    freerdp2-dev \
    libssh2-1-dev \
    libpango1.0-dev \
    libpulse-dev \
    libwebp-dev \
    libvorbis-dev \
